sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2015/L.10), the SBI, inter alia: • notes progress made on the scope of the revision and its discussion of the revisions to the projection timeline specified in paragraph 37 of the UNFCCC reporting guidelines on national communications; • invites parties to submit further views on the revision of the guidelines by 1 September 2015; • requests the Secretariat to update the technical paper on the revision of the guidelines; and • agrees to continue its work at SBI 43, with a view to the revised guidelines being adopted at COP 21, noting that if additional time beyond SBI 43 is required, the SBI requests the Secretariat to organize a pre-session workshop prior to SBI 44.
